website_summaries.verdict: Versatile in use. Best designed for packaging heavy objects.
pros: Delivers in its ability to secure packaging with both plastic straps as well as fabric ones
In just a few tries, customers have been able to secure large objects such as logs
Ultra secure yet easy to remove as well
cons: May not support all irregular shipments but does effectively secure 2,000 pounds of product

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several months ago and just used it for the first time yesterday. I am using it with 3/4" poly strapping for tying down rough lumber on pallets for air drying. It took me a couple tries to get it down right, but once you get the hang of it, it is a great tool. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank should last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! Quality feel, all metal parts should last a very long time, if not a lifetime. I use it to strap boxes together to make one box, and heavily packed ones where you need miles of tape just to keep the flaps down and the sides from ripping. Didn't come with instructions on how to use it but I found a YouTube video which clearly shows how. Once you know how its so easy a 5th grader can do it!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Timer

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: We use these at work, We have 3 banders and used a different brand that cost twice as much. As those have broken down we have replaced them with the Pac strapping rachets and they perform very well and have held up quite well during every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Newton

customer_reviews.title: This tool is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awesome! All metal, easy to use, reliable--it tensions the strapping as tight as you want and securely holds it while you button/seal it up.
customer_reviews.author: Skoo

customer_reviews.title: PAC IS MY PIC!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product quality, very nice weight and feel, all metal parts other than the ratcheting handle, but no sacrifice in quality there, the clicks in ratchet are high in number so you can be pretty precise on tension and the grabbing and cutting mechanism are very consistent, this is a much better solution to low volume strapping, no need for a $5,000 spooling and strapping machine here, LOVE THIS, thanks PAC!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool. I'm confident it will serve my needs far, far into the future!
customer_reviews.author: some1else

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used with the strapping wire, easy to use once I read the directions and really tightened up the strap so the products shipped stayed in place. If you do a lot of shipping this is nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Shells

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great to tension the plastic strapping. Used to do it manually before but never again. This tool really saves the hands!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good tool so far. It feels heavy and sturdy, almost every part is made of metal. Works well for my needs
customer_reviews.author: zach wedekind

customer_reviews.title: Tight straps
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I have another one similar to this one but it would slip before strap was very tight. This one does not slip no matter how tight you make it. Will buy another one like it when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Glad !
customer_reviews.text: works great for my needs ! Glad I purchased it ! Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: moleman

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Works great well built. Got 4 for my warehouse. Never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: MacJet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent commercial build quality. Gets the job done and makes sealing straps simple.
customer_reviews.author: NWShopper007

customer_reviews.title: Working very well. Very simple to use, makes nice tight bundles.
customer_reviews.text: Working very well. Very simple to use, makes nice tight bundles.
customer_reviews.author: Stickman

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but takes a bit of experience. See photos for procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Nardi

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. High quality and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: easy to use with proper care
customer_reviews.text: well designed and built, easy to use with proper care, should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best way to tighten the strapping prior to sealing
customer_reviews.author: Henry R. Tumblin

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because reviews were good and we have large boxes that tape is expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because reviews were good and we have large boxes that tape is expensive for. DOES NOT WORK had to return it. Not sure if they just shipped me a bad apple or what happened, but it came with yellow strapping STUCK in it unable to move. I think the prior buyers returned it for it being defective. You get what you pay for. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Dont you hate removing these things when you dont have a razor available.
customer_reviews.text: I was always annoyed when I had to cut these off a package. Now I can use these straps to confidently secure my own packages. I use it to tie many things together in my home. heavy duty and super strong.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Flow

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfy. For the perfomance I I can't say anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Just looking at it, I am satisfy. For the perfomance I I can't say anything yet because I do'nt have the strapping plastic to use with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PAC Strapping PST34 Plastic Strap General Use Manual Tensioner, For 3/4" Wide Strap
product_meta.description: Size Name:Pack of 1Founded in 1982, PAC Strapping Products, Inc, is a full service manufacturer and supplier of plastic strapping, plastic strapping machines and systems, steel strapping, along with tools and accessories for both plastic and steel strapping. For over 25 years PAC has focused on providing the best value in our industry by supplying our customers with a full line of quality products, on time delivery, competitive pricing and innovative solutions. PAC brand tools are tough and durable. All PAC brand tools are backed by a complete parts inventory and our service department. PAC Strapping PST34 strapping tensioner for up to 3/4" plastic strap.
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty ratchet tensioner for polypropylene and polyester strapping
Heavy duty steel construction ensures years of use
Use with up to 3/4" wide strap
